description: Smallest number which when iterated n times under A003285(n) gives a square.
comments: Smallest m such that A003285(A003285(..(m))) = square with n iterations.
example: A003285(A003285(3)))=1, 3 is the smallest number requiring 2 iterations to reach a square number, so a(2)=3.
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Nov 08 2001
